question: What is the grading system?
answer: LPU follows a 10-point CGPA system. Grades: A+ (90-100%, 10 points), A (80-89%, 9 points), B+ (70-79%, 8 points), B (60-69%, 7 points), C+ (50-59%, 6 points), C (40-49%, 5 points), F (<40%, 0 points). CGPA formula: Sum of (Grade Points × Credits) / Total Credits. Minimum 5.0 CGPA required for degree. Internationally recognized system helps in global admissions.

question: How to check attendance?
answer: Access UMS portal at ums.lpu.in, login with registration number and password, go to 'My Attendance' section. View subject-wise attendance percentage for theory and practical separately. Minimum 75% required for exam eligibility. System sends alerts at 80%. Parents can track via ERP. Update real-time after each class. For discrepancies, contact faculty with proof.

question: When are semester exams?
answer: Odd Semester End-Terms: November-December, Mid-Terms: September. Even Semester End-Terms: April-May, Mid-Terms: February-March. Dates announced 30 days advance on UMS. Date sheet uploaded 15 days before exams. Supplementary exams in June-July. Check academic calendar on website regularly.

question: What is credit system?
answer:
CBCS system: 1 credit = 1 hour theory/week OR 2 hours practical/week.
BTech needs ~160 credits, MBA needs 60-72 credits. Pass requires 40% theory + 40% practical + 50% overall. Failed courses must be repeated. CGPA = Σ(Grade Points × Credits)/ΣCredits. Credits transfer possible with approval. System allows flexible pacing.

question: How to apply for re-evaluation?
answer: Apply within 10 days of result via UMS portal. Fee: Rs.1,000/subject. Process: Login→Examination→Re-evaluation→Select Subject→Pay→Download receipt. Results in 30 days. Checks: mark addition, transfer, unevaluated portions. Marks may increase/decrease/same. Original marks retained if decreased. Can view answer script for Rs.500. Contact exam dept for queries.

question: What is passing criteria?
answer: Requirements: 40% minimum in BOTH theory and practical separately + 50% overall aggregate + 75% attendance mandatory + Grade C (5 points) minimum. Internal assessment 20% of total. Failed = backlog, max 3 attempts. Overall 5.0 CGPA needed for degree.

question: How to check timetable?
answer: UMS Portal: ums.lpu.in → My Timetable → View/Download PDF. Shows day-wise schedule, subjects, faculty, rooms, timings, credits. Color-coded theory/labs. Real-time updates. LPU Touch app for mobile with notifications. Physical boards in departments. Sync with Google Calendar possible. Check before each class for changes.

question: Library timings?
answer: Mon-Fri: 8AM-10PM. Sat-Sun: 9AM-6PM. Exam periods: 7AM-11PM. 24/7 reading rooms during exams. Digital library 24/7 online. Reference: 8AM-8PM. Circulation: 9AM-7PM. Discussion rooms: 9AM-8PM bookable. Collection: 1.5L books, 50K e-books, 15K journals. Free WiFi, printing, scanning available.

question: How many departments?
answer: 50+ departments across faculties: Engineering (16 depts - CSE, ECE, Mech, Civil, Elect, Aerospace, etc.), Management (4 depts - MBA, Int'l Business), Computer App (3 depts - MCA, IT, Data Science), Pharma (5 depts), Hotel Mgmt (3 depts), Design (4 depts), Architecture, Arts (10+ depts), Sciences (11 depts), Agriculture (6 depts), Law, Education, Physiotherapy, Commerce, Economics. Each with dedicated labs, faculty, research facilities.

question: Can I change course?
answer: Possible in first semester with conditions: 70%+ in 12th, meet new course eligibility, seats available, no discipline issues. Apply via Academic Counselor with form, documents, fee (Rs.5K same school, Rs.10K different school). Processing 2-4 weeks. Fee difference adjustment. Some credits may transfer. Entrance test for some switches. Contact Student Welfare: 01824-404404.
